column5: Clean, beautifully decorated home 15 miles outside Austin, located in Pflugerville, TX. Easy access to IH35. Can sleep up to 8 people comfortably in this 3 bedroom, 2 bath. Master bedroom has KING size bed with private full bath. 2nd bedroom has Queen size bed and 3rd bedroom has twin size bed. Sofa and queen size blow up mattress available. Garage parking for 1 car, driveway and street parking for other vehicles. Cable, internet, full kitchen and washer and dryer available. This is the perfect home away from home.
